sn35.168:1.1: “Yam, bhikkhave, aniccam, tatra vo chando pahatabbo.
sn35.168:1.3: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, aniccam; tatra vo chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn35.168:1.4: jivha anicca; tatra vo chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn35.168:1.5: mano anicco; tatra vo chando pahatabbo.
sn35.168:1.6: Yam, bhikkhave, aniccam, tatra vo chando pahatabbo”ti.
